charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE (1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft committed to custody of B.O.P. for term of 1,255 months. Term consists of: 235 months on each of Count One and Two in 1:98-cr-20, Count One in 1:98-cr-97, Count One in 1:98-cr-116, Counts One, Three and Five in 1:98-cr-117, Count One in 1:98-cr-118, Count One in 1:98-cr-119, Count One in 1:98-cr-120, Count One in 1:98-cr-130, Count One(a) in 1:99-cr-02, Counts One and Two in 1:99-cr-3, Count Two in 1:98-cr-97, Count Two in 1:98-cr-118, Counts Two, Four and Six in 1:98-cr-120, and Counts One(b) and Two in 1:99-cr-2 all to be served concurrently: 60 months on Count Two in 1:98-cr-117, to be served consecutively to the aforementioned counts; 240 months on Count Four in 1:98-cr-117, to be served consecutively to the aforementioned counts; 240 months on Count Six in 1:98-cr-117, to be served consecutively to the aforementioned counts; 240 months on Count Three in 1:98-cr-120, to be served consecutively to the aforementioned counts; 240 months on Count Five in 1:98-cr-120, to be served consecutively to the aforementioned counts for a total term of 1,255 months. Deft placed on supervised release for term of 5 years. 3 years on each of counts one and two in 1:98-cr-20, count one in 1:98-cr-97, count one in 1:98-cr-116, counts one, two, three, four, five and six in 1:98-cr-117, count one in 1:98-cr-118, count one in 1:98-cr-119, counts one, three, and five in 1:98-cr-120, Count one in 1:98-cr-130, Count One(a) in 1:99-cr-2, and Counts One and Two in 1:99-cr-3 and terms of five years on each of Count Two in 1:98-cr-97, Count Two in 1:98-cr-118, Counts Two, Four and Six in 1:98-cr-120 and Counts One(b) and Two in 1:99-cr-02 all such terms to run concurrently. Special Assessment $2,600. Court recommends: Mental Health Treatment. (1-2)
